name: Metal
tooltip: Metal, the raw meterial of choice (commodity and crafting ingredient)

name: Missile Launcher
tooltip: Blow up your foes with extreme prejudace. Remember to build missiles too!

name: Missile
tooltip: You can tell these things are old because they’re still using atmo-fins.

name: Heater
tooltip: What better way to damage something in space then to introduce a little entropy than the time honored method of red hot plasma?

name: Mass Driver
tooltip: Couldn’t be simpler - it uses electrical power (which, gee I hope you have plenty, otherwise you’ve got bigger problems) to fling what we in the business call “heavy objects” in the general direction of people who you’re not too fond of.

name: Mass Driver Slug
tooltip: Chunks of shaped metal for slinging at your enemies.

name: Lutetium
tooltip: used for room temprature superconductors (crafting ingredient)
